Latest: 11:30 A.M.  天气/多云

Name: Kal'tsit
Latest: 这次又要做什么？

Name: Closure
Latest: 凯尔希，我等会能去看看博士吗？

Name: Kal'tsit
Latest: 你是好久没有对{@nickname}恶作剧，又手痒了？
English: You haven't played a joke on {@nickname} for some time, are your hands itching again?

Name: Closure
Latest: 欸，不要那么警觉嘛！我可是好心在关心人家呢！
English: Hey, no need to be so alert! I'm being kind in caring for Doctor!

Name: Kal'tsit
Latest: 上一次你说关心别人的后果，是创造了一间连续三个月都在午夜零点自动播放“可露希尔的午夜录像超商”的舱室。
English: The last time you said you cared for others, you created a cabin that automatically played "Closure's business" advertisement at midnight that lasted for three months.

Name: Closure
English: But...

Latest: 还没法调低音量。

Name: Closure

Name: Kal'tsit
Latest: 然而，Dr.{@nickname}现在是失忆状态，是否记得你还是个未知数。
English: However, Dr.{@nickname} is now in an amnesic state, whether you will be remembered is uncertain.

Name: Closure
Latest: 啊？是睡太久了睡傻了吗？好惨哦，之后去给博士送点零食慰问一下好了。
English: Ah? Did Doctor sleep too long and become stupid? Oh, that's terrible. Then I'll give Doctor a snack.

Name: Kal'tsit
Latest: 随你。只是，别再给Dr.{@nickname}留下些坏印象。
English: Do whatever you want. Just don't leave a bad impression to Dr.{@nickname}.

English: Warfarin had been bad enough, her actions added {@nickname} misunderstanding over blood demon. Kazdell affair would be forced to be delayed. For an indefinite period.

Name: Kal'tsit

English: You hacked the surveillance and deleted the video, but the console had a biometric backup system. I had 13 slices of tissue samples spread out over different periods of time.

English: Why, don't be so cold, Kalt'sit. Now that Doctor has lost his memory, shouldn't we let Doctor feel his companions warmth?
